column4: howdy! i just installed late last night (i was drunk/tired) and finished configuration this morning, but don't remember the passwd I setup.  What are my possible options?  boot into knoppix and chroot?
anything else?
boot in single mode
i've never used grub, can anyone help with syntax?
i need to reset the password
so i can login
just boot in single mode and do passwd <username> :)
i don't know how to boot in single with grub
in ubuntu you'll see multiple boot options
i'm an unititiated LILO user
some have (recovery mode) behind it
ah lilo
for lilo specify linux 1
if that's still correct of course :s
well yeah, i KNOW how to boot single in lilo, but not grub, which is what ubuntu uses
if you'd use grub you'd have the (recovery mode) options, dont' know if the lilo boot menu has those also
i'll take a look at the menu boot options, thanks
just chose a boot option with (recovery mode) like Ubuntu, kernel 2.6.8.1-2-386 (recovery mode)
that'll boot you into single mode
cool, thanks
thanks so much, that did it!!
didn't realize recovery mode was single, good to know, maybe they could make a note of it in the grub menu for a next release...
if you want to see the contents of a grub menu when it comes up a boot just press "e" :)
